name: Midge_Loomer
text:
Midge Loomer
Midge Loomer was a receptionist at the Lydecker Veterinary Clinic in February 1989.
Biography
Loomer was working at the front desk at the clinic when FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper and Sheriff Harry S. Truman came in search of the bird Waldo. Cooper asked her if they treated birds at the clinic and confiscated their files.
